0.content:
More growth is always a good thing, so have some more scenarios, with plenty of space to add even more!

Hyper-Puberty: For most people, animals and anthros, puberty is something that happens during the teenage years, and causes a lot of embarassment and hopefully some nice physical bonuses if they're luckily. For the subjects of this scenario, though, puberty is going to occur much, much earlier - any age under about thirteen or so. Newly-born dragons find themselves looking way, way down at their parents, and being far stronger than they could ever hope to be; baby horses find that their 'equipment' is so large that even the biggest, cockiest stallion could never hope to match them. Small anthro children begin to tower over entire buildings as their cocks or tits block off all sight of anything in-front of them.

Can anything stop - or even slow - their rampant, berserk growth?

Affection: A lot of animals and anthros are affectionate. Some more-so than others. Some over-affectionate. And then there are those so, so affectionate, that giving or receiving even the slightest hint of affection forces their bodies to grow, and grow, and grow. And the bigger you are, the easier it is you show your affection to someone...
0.title: More scenarios!

1.content:
First off, choose your storyline. For all of these storylines, you may choose your own character, play the narrator, or simply be the giant, growing animal(s)!

The Reawakened Power: After a long sleep filled with odd, gigantic animals, you awake to discover your ability to change the size of any animals you see or think of from anything. However, whenever you change the size of something, everyone's memories will be added on or changed accordingly.

The Many Hows of Growth: A mysterious force summons you to your house's attic where you find an ancient stone tablet bearing a single encryption. After deciphering it with the help of the strange being, you find out that it says: "The Question is not why the Animal species of Earth have remained Unequally Dormant, it is How." Later, you find that each unique species on Earth has unique ways to "become equal" with the power they deserved upon their existence on Earth.

Dreams of Giants: You fall asleep on an ordinary night, but have extraordinary, non-ending dreams of animals growing to enormous proportions.

Too Good: You're an animal caretaker, but every single animal you work with ends up growing to extreme sizes.
1.title: Choosing your story

choices: Go visit the farms in the nearby countryside
11.content:
You turn off the light on your bedside table and hop into bed. It was an exhausting day and you can't wait to finally get a good sleep. You fall fast asleep almost as soon as your head plops onto the pillow.

You wake up to the sun sneaking through the window blinds and stretch in your bed groggily. You laugh quietly as you remember the most ridiculous dream you've ever had. In your dream, you were surrounded by growing and already giant animals that would appear through the thick fog around you. You weren't scared of them all in the slightest; you were more astonished and a little excited. It was just too bad you woke up when you did; the dream was really starting to get interesting.

Just for fun, you roll over, grab the old teddy bear next to your bed, and hold it up in front of you. You concentrate on the bear's small size; you've always wanted a bigger teddy bear. It suddenly swelled to the size you were wishing it to be, about twice a large. Astonished, you set it down and concentrated on it further. It soon doubled in size once more, filling a large space on your floor.

You've realized that you had the power to grow anything animal related due to your dream! Eager to test out your new powers, you decided to...
11.title: The Reawakened Power

choices: Go back inside and do something else
111.content:
You decide to stay home, remembering that you have to let your dog out around this time of day anyway. You walk to the back door and call your golden retriever's name. He sprints out from the right, his tail wagging fast and his tongue hanging out. He was about to come inside through the open screen door when you closed it, preparing to put your thoughts into effect.

Upon seeing the door close, your dog jumped up on your legs and tried to lick you while you laughed. He always was a friendly dog and you wanted to see him happy no matter what. Sure, he had a yard to play in with a few toys; however, the yard was rather small and he needed new toys badly.

You will finally be able to give him his wish, as well as yours.

You look down at your dog as he looks back up at you happily, wagging his tail madly. You concentrate on growing your dog with all your might, thinking of him growing a couple of feet. Your golden retriever seems unaware of the changes to his body, but he soon realizes something's different when he becomes eye level with you. Your now 6 foot tall dog licks you excitedly, covering your entire face in slobber; his tongue must have been as wide as your entire head!

Your very pleased that he is happy with his new size and is going along so well with it. In fact, it seems he has already found a new toy; he had already ran to the back of the yard and pulled a small bush out of the ground easily with his teeth. You knew that he enjoyed having a new toy to chew on, and it felt nice to give him even more happiness.
111.title: Stay home

choices: Grab your bear and dog, head to college,and hope they can somehow explain this!
Head out for a walk, but leave your dog here. It's too risky to take him out.
Head out for a walk, bringing your dog with you. You can't risk all that damage.
1111.content:
You leaned against the door frame, watching as your dog eagerly devoured the bush as his tail wagged furiously, shredding the leaves and shattering the branches into tiny fragments, which he happily swallowed. You were briefly concerned for him as he did so, but he seemed to suffer no discomfort or pain, despite swallowing what had to be rather sharp shards of wood. Either they weren't as sharp as you'd thought, or his greater size also granted him greater resilience, to the stage where they were completely unable to harm him, leaving his throat completely unharmed.

You shook your head as you tried to come to terms with just how unbelievable this whole situation was, yet it was happening right in front of you, before your very eyes! You could still hardly believe that your dog was so huge now, all because you had wanted him to be bigger! It was impossible, yet it was real. And all of this had been because of a dream, you'd developed this... supernatural power to make anything animal related grow!

You grimaced and shook your head again. You were a college student majoring in Biology, yet you had just seriously considered a supernatural power. But, what else could it be? Dogs couldn't just grow like that, not to that size, that quickly. Then there was that teddy bear, it wasn't even a living thing, yet it had grown to twice its size right in front of your eyes! You just couldn't understand it, you'd have to try and find some way to figure out what had happened because as much as the thought unnerved you, a supernatural explanation was all you could come up with.

Your attention was drawn back to your dog as he barked cheerily, you looked up to see that the bush had been obliterated by his now much larger, and possibly sharper, teeth. He looked so happy, despite the fact that the yard was now considerably more cramped. Maybe being so much bigger gave him a new perspective on things.

You pulled your gaze away from him to look around the house. A sense of unease rose up inside you as you realised that the house was now so much smaller compared to him, it'd be difficult to move around now. You'd need to be very careful that he didn't end up breaking anything with his sheer bulk, given that he was so huge now.

However, looking back at him... You couldn't help but feel a bit of... excitement? The idea of your dog being so big that you'd need to make sure his sheer size didn't damage your home was oddly thrilling. And, since it made him so happy, well, maybe making your beloved canine companion a bit bigger still, wouldn't be so bad, would it?

You push yourself off the doorframe with a sigh, focusing on your dog. It hadn't even been ten minutes since you'd gotten up, and you were already growing him again!

He was sitting there, still looking at you intently, his tail wagging furiously behind him. As you focused on him, you could see that he was growing again. It was slow at first, but it quickly picked up speed, his already massive frame stretching out in every direction! His ears rose higher as his tail and backside crept closer and closer to the fence. His huge paws swelled outwards, to the point where they had to easily outsize dinner plates, as his chest bulged outwards. As you watched his body grow, you took in a sharp gasp of breath. On his growing chest, you could clearly see the faint outline of muscles developing.

As his height crept up past a staggering seven feet tall, the rest of his frame filled out in an equally impressive manner. His limbs thickened and bulged with cords of powerful muscle beneath the thick fur. His huge tongue lolled out of his mouth as he panted and huffed in bliss. He was taller than the average man by a substantial margin and far more powerfully built, and he was only getting bigger!

The Golden Retriever continued to grow bigger and bigger, taller and stronger with every passing moment! It was incredible! He pushed outwards, surpassing a whopping eight feet tall. You could only stare in awe at how enormous he was, and how absolutely delighted he seemed! You were the one responsible for this, but you almost felt as though you couldn't stop yourself now.

You closed your eyes, shaking your head as you took in a few, steadying breaths. You had to stop this. Your dog being big was incredible, but not when it was going to cause property damage. You swallowed thickly as you focused on your dog's growth coming to a halt.

After a few nerve-wracking seconds, you opened your eyes. The sight that greeted you drew a startled gasp from your lips as you stumbled back, gripping the doorframe for support. Your dog was enormous!

Towering over you at a staggering nine feet tall, his entire frame practically rippling with thick, powerful muscles, he looked down at you with an overjoyed expression as his tail wagged so fast it became a blur. He stepped forward, lowering his huge head to nose down on your comparatively tiny form. His nose had to be the size of your head! You gently raise a hand and place it atop his muzzle, gently stroking it for a moment before you step back to allow his massive frame to squeeze through the door. You hold your breath as the doorframe groans slightly under the force, but to your relief, nothing breaks.

You watch in amazement as your dog rises to his full height, his head lowered so that he can stand in the room, with his back pressed against the ceiling. You stumble over to the sofa and crash onto it, trying to think of what you're going to do now. Your dog is already nearly too big for the house, but he looks so happy, and he hasn't damaged anything yet and he seems to be taking care. However, he's still a giant of a dog, and you have no idea how you're going to adapt to this now. Not to mention, you have no idea how this works.

You run your hand over your face as you weigh your options. Perhaps you can take your teddy and your dog and call up your college? Maybe the University can start looking into this. Perhaps it's some ability your brain has gained somehow? Maybe a CT scan will find something odd. Or, perhaps it really is supernatural, and there's no explanation you would ever find.

Maybe you should head out and trust your dog to just keep himself calm, try and gather your thoughts, and hopefully, avoid making any other dogs or other animals grow. That said, trusting a massive, muscular, nine foot giant of a dog to not break anything is a risky decision, but so is taking him out on the street. for everyone else to see.

One thing is for sure: With such power, you had better make your choice wisely.
1111.title: Good Boy, Big Boy

1113.content: You decide to let your dog have fun in the backyard for a while while you rest inside. Once in your room, you plop down onto your bed, thinking of what else would be fun to change with your powers.
1113.title: Inside

choices: Remain in town, to grow some of the nearby animals (and/or plushes?)
Go to the pet shop. Plently of choices.
To the zoo. More exotic choices.
112.content:
To go into town. Surely you'd see plenty of animals, even if they would be less present than at other places. Besides, you could always go to a pet shop, or even the zoo. Or you could mess up with more thing and see how the town fare.

Regardless, and rather than to just blindly grow stuff on sight, you prefer to think it over with a nice walk, peering at the dogs walking with their masters, wandering cats, flying birds, and even a rat. You doubt that you should grow such, but it would certainly be an option among others! And maybe you could spot some more plushes or something similar in the shops.

Knowing that, you..
112.title: Go visit the city streets

1123.content:
After reflexion, you decide to go to the zoo. After you pay for a ticket, you step in and see around the different cages and encloses. Thankfully, the amounts of visitor is pretty low, meaning that you would be more of less left in peace when you'd mess up with the animals, at least for the time being.

You grab a map of the zoo and checks up for the list of animals that stands in. Then you walk around, to see if anything catch your interest. You spot a small elephant that, strangely enough, was separated from the others. You wonder if it's not because of the size that it is set up like that. You also see that the crocodile enclosure looked.. Dull. The reptiles are just basking in the sun, moving around and eating whatever food they are given, without a rush. Surely you could spice it up.

Or.. You could try other animals!
1123.title: To the zoo!

choices: Hang out with her. (And maybe grow more animals. So she doesn't feel left out)
Grow her. Surely she'd be only better if there's more of her to love.
11232.content:
You lean closer to the crocodiles' enclosure, as far as you're allowed to, and study them. Some of them decide to go into the pool, not wanting to be seen, while some others just idly stands there. Not overly sure to pick which to mess up with, you sigh, and leans onto the barrier, when you hear one of them. Its mouth is wide open, and it faces you up, before it cautiously takes a few steps back, near the pool.

The beast is roughly 9 ft long, and its dentition looked fine. You wonder if it was born in captivity, and isn't the biggest around, but it seems to be the most active around. You decide to concentrate onto it, trying to have a mental image of it, grown.

As it starts to lengthen out, it takes a step forward, either asking to not being messed with, or out of its growing confidence. You couldn't tell. But even then the grow was going smootly, something unexpected occurs. One of the other crocodiles, the biggest one, wanted to pass, or to get the growing's one place. The latter walks backward, then both growls at each others. You inadvertly lose the control of your power and grow both! While the one you had focused onto grow faster.

When the size difference became clear, the smaller grown crocodile growls again, seemingly annoyed and go into the pool, while the bigger one looks at you and.. Rush toward you! Out of shock and fear, you fall onto your back, before taking a few steps back, before you relax. The crocodile, now 30 ft long, couldn't, regardless, get over the barrier. Or so you thought, when it started to.. Lift its body up..?

Backing up once more, and starting to regret your actions, given you thought you'd end up in the.. Changing crocodile..? Its legs and arms lengthened right before you eyes, noisily reshaping themselves into more humanoid shapes, its hands becoming strangely similar to human hands, if you exclude the claws.. The feet, on the other hand, remain more or less what they were, aside that they get lifted up in a such a manner that it forced it to stand on a digitigrade stance. Its neck lengthen slightly, becoming visible, before its head goes down, much like it would be for a human. As Seemingly, she was now 35 ft tall, with her tail being a good 20 ft long. And yet, the weirdest had yet to occur..

The human-crocodile hybrid leans closer to you, disregarding completely the fact that you tried to flee, when you notice two bumps pushing on its.. Her..? Chest. Blushing madly, and shocked to the point of immobilizing yourself, you notice nipples making their way onto the crocodile's breasts, becoming voluptuous E-cup breasts.

Suddenly, you feel lifted up, and.. Get gently kissed..? Then the anthropomorphic's mouth open up. Out of reflex, you whimper, 'Don't eat me! I-i'm not edible..!'. The crocodile giggles, before she gently kisses you. And says, 'Thank you.~'. Completely confused, you whisper, 'A-a t-talking crocodile!?', before you faint.

When you wake up, you let a 'hnnnng..'. Your bed felt.. Awfully warm. And comfy. And.. Scaly..!? You try to get off the makeshift bed, when you notice the bed is.. The anthropomorphic crocodile's cleavage. And you notice that she was nude, even around the groin. Blushing again, you turn yourself to face the crocodile's visage. She was smiling. And she says, 'How's my mate doing?~'. You stutter, 'M-mate..!?'. 'Something's wrong?'. 'Y-ye.. Err.. N-.. I-i mean.. Y-you're a huge breasted crocodile..! A-and.. You are actually cute.. I admit..'. She giggles, then she hugs you. You meep, shocked at first, but eventually relax, when you hear other crocodiles. For some reasons, you were *in* the enclosure. Thankfully, your new, albeit very tall, girlfriend growls, making them scurry off, aside from the biggest of the ferals, looking more annoyed than scared. Then she says, 'Don't worry, my little crocodile.. I'll protect you.~'.

You manage to persuade to make the crocogirl to step off the enclosure, so you'd speak more freely. As it turns out, she wasn't having a bad life, but the male she made leave was bothering her when she was smaller, and could only be grateful at the cutey that helped her. And while she didn't had a name per say, she had been named Brenda by the humans' working in the zoo.
You say your name to the croco girl, then decide to..
11232.title: Spice up the crocodiles! (With growth.)

113.content: You quickly get dressed and ready for the day, and head out to your car. You get in and buckle up. You slowly back out of the drive way, then drive out to your cousin's farm. He has a ton of animals you always loved from horses to cows to pigs and more! You soon arrive begin to think about what you should grow. So many choices, but where to start? Perhaps with...
113.title: Go visit the farms in the nearby countryside

1131.content: You decide that your first favorite farm animal the horses but witch sex of horse should you grow male or female.
1131.title: Horsies!

choices: You decide to continue growing the loving mare
The mare starts to transform into a macro anthro
11312.content:
After arriving at the local farm, you see a large pasture full of lush green grass and plenty of stallions and mares grazing and enjoying the warmth of the spring sun. You begin to walk through the pasture, taking note of all the horses until you spot one in particular that you makes you stop in your tracks and head over to it. It's a beautiful mare with a deep chestnut coat and delicate white markings near her hooves and on top of her head.

As she grazes, you walk on up to her and pat her side affectionately. She notices, and with a certain degree of warmth she lifts her head and nuzzles you with her muzzle as you pet and hold her a bit. After a moment you take a step back and grin, deciding that she is a lovely mare in much need of some proper size.

Concentrating on the mare, she starts to swell in size, first very slowly and then picking up. She grows and grows as you focus on her, soon reaching 7 feet tall, then 8, 9, 10...all the while you can't help but smile as she balloons up in size, the beautiful and kind mare finally getting some size she deserves, you think to yourself. You hug as much of her underbelly as you can, and soon her leg, as she grows ever bigger in size. The mare looks down on you with what appears to be a radiant glow in her eyes and an almost human-like smile upon her muzzle.

It is that moment that you decide to increase her growth rate, concentrating even harder on her as she closes her eyes and raises her head back up high. You grin even further as you know she must be enjoying her growth, especially since you can hear her breathing deeply and nickering softly as well.

Up and up the brown mare swells in the sun-soaked pasture, growing and growing quickly past 15 feet tall, then 20 feet, 25...

You grin as you keep on looking up and up at the massively growing mare, wondering if you should continue growing her for a while.
11312.title: Mare

114.content:
You decide to go and visit the park; there were sure to be lots of animals you could have fun with there. Sure enough, after you ride your bike down to the park and park it you see lots of people walking their dogs. However, one of the men that is walking their dogs strikes you as curious since he looks so confident walking his huge Rottweiler down the sidewalk. The dog doesn't look too happy either; maybe some growth could fix that and his owner's pompous behavior.

You concentrate on the dog and he soon expands greatly, rising up to 20 feet tall in no time. The deep rumble from his steps stops as the rottie looks around curiously upon seeing everything smaller. He looks down at his owner, who is staring up and cowering in fear, and bends down to give him an enormous lick. Drenched in slobber, the man screams and runs off, although the dog still looks happy. You laugh and walk up to the dog. If he enjoys this size so much he will no doubt love to be even bigger.
114.title: The park

choices: Go find some toys for him to play with
1141.content: You want to see what will happen if the Rottweiler grows even bigger. You stare up at his happy, drooling face and concentrate on him as hard as you can. You walk back a little bit as you see the dog rising higher and higher into the sky, and soon you are looking up at a massive 100 foot rottie. The dog barked in joy upon observing his new surroundings; the trees and the people must look like bugs to him. Other people walking their dogs yelled indistinctly, running away with their barking dogs that wanted a closer look. The park was soon empty and your new Rottweiler looked a little sad. Maybe he could have some fun with the whole city as a playground, you thought.
1141.title: A 100 foot Rottie

11411.content:
Still in between the Rottweiler's huge paws and staring up at him, you close your eyes to concentrate on him more and soon hear the same peculiar expanding noise of him growing. You open your eyes, craning your neck more and more as you watch the huge dog becoming bigger and bigger. You soon have to walk back a few feet from his ever-expanding paws that keep on taking up more and more space on the ground. He barks playfully as you watch his head shoot up faster and faster, and before long you hear the loud crunching of metal and wood that you knew must have been playsets and park benches.

Being cautious and not wanting to wreak too much destruction with your new powers just yet, you concentrate and stop his growth.
11411.title: Grow him even more

115.content: Which place will you go to?
115.title: Trees or Seas?

1152.content:
You get up and get dressed, getting on your T-shirt, swim trunks and sandals. You plan to take a stroll on the beach and see if anything catches your eye. Luckily, you live pretty close to the ocean: it's only about a 10 minute walk from your house.

When you get there, you start walking through the faded outlines of previous waves that came to shore, letting you feet get wet a little bit. The ocean was pretty warm as it was summer time, and a cool breeze wafting through your hair made the atmosphere just perfect.

You stop to stare out into the crystal blue waters, hoping to see any signs of life now that you have your new ability.

Just then, as to answer your prayers, you see about 50 feet in front of you the distinct shape of a(n)...
1152.title: The beach

12.content:
The attic was dusty, and you rarely went up there. But now, you felt drawn to the musty room by some invisible force, almost like a moth to a flame. The stairs freaked under your bare feet as you walked up them, and soon enough you felt the cold, rough carpet of the attic. It was a small room, painted a dull white and slightly smaller than your bedroom. Usually it was piled high with boxes of this and that, but now they were somehow gone. The only thing in the room was a stone tablet, surely as large as your torso. It looked as if it had been ripped from a cliff surface rather than cut from stone, its edges rough and bumpy. Ancient, runic text was carved into the rectangular surface facing you, and the entire tablet glowed with a dull light.

You could somehow sense a presence next to you, directing you. Older than the stars themselves and commanding you like a puppet, it filled your head with its knowledge before retreating. It needed your fleshy body to work its magic.

The text rearranged and shifted before your eyes, and words became visible, their meanings becoming clear to you moments later.
The question is not Why the animal species of Earth have remained unequally dormant; it is How.

You licked your lips, furrowing your brow uneasily. Unequally dormant - what did that mean? And... what if the animals stopped being so? What would that mean for humanity?

As you watch, the words break apart, rearranging into a picture. Somehow, you knew that the picture it formed represented the first animal that would be made Equal, and non-dormant. You squint at the picture, and realise that it is...
12.title: How's and Why's

choices: Soon, he reaches 50 feet, and doesn't show any signs of slowing!
He reaches 100 feet and is only growing faster!
122.content:
A horse? Why a horse? And what does this whole unequal thing mean even?! Well, you know you had always kept a horse with you because you had always loved them, despite him being a runt of the litter. Could...could it be talking about your horse?! You rush outside to see your horse and try to find out if anything is wrong.

When you get outside, you see your horse in it's stable, shaking it's head like normal. You sigh in relief, thinking that that whole stone tablet thing was just your imagination...until you see your horse shaking, very violently at that. Worrying for your horse, and not that prophecy anymore you rush over to see if your horse is going to be okay.

You let him out of the stable, to be able to get a better look over him. As soon as you do, your horse slowly begins to grow bigger! Stepping back in fear, you watch as your horse soon doubles in size. Well, he's definitely not a runt anymore...but he's still growing bigger! And his growth rate seems to have increased as well, as he's swelling up in size even faster now! You start to wonder how big he might get...
122.title: A horse god!

1222.content: The hourse reaches 50 feet now your standing at his hoof you look up at the hoof and water in the mouth
1222.title: Soon, he reaches 50 feet, and doesn't show ...

choices: Did you see it go down towards your room?
Do you think you saw it go outside?
123.content:
A snake? Yes. It's becoming clear. The words on the tablet melded together, and came to form the silhouette of a snake on the tablet. But why a snake? Not that there's anything wrong with them. You liked them. In fact you had a pet snake that you adored in your bedroom upstairs.
You've had him for about a year now. You named him Brock. He had a very interesting pewter gray and muddled white coloring that stood out to you when you saw him, so the name suited him. He seemed to like you, and have bonded very well from the start. Very social and enjoyed your presence when you played with him. He especially liked to wrap himself around your arm and neck at times. But sometimes you think it was because he wanted warmth.
While in thought of your pet, you failed to notice the image of the snake coming off the tablet and hovering over it in a dull blue light. When you turned to notice, the snake image quickly leaves the attic and down the stairs. You race out and try to chase after it and see where it went. But which way did it go?
123.title: A snake?

choices: A bat... like the one hanging nearby!
125.content: It takes awhile for the image to become a little more clear, as though the directing entity itself is uncertain which animal it wants to start with, but eventually it becomes distinctive. There is also the sense that the entity is still indecisive on the "how" part...
125.title: Some other animal!

choices: Nothing unusual, other than it's still getting bigger.
It's taking on a humanoid form, and is a male!
It's taking on a humanoid form, and is a female!
1251.content:
The image is that of a bat, much like the one hanging nearby... in fact, almost exactly like the one nearby in the attic! Which also begs the question of how it got in. Probably the same way this odd stone tablet did...

The bat seems to sense your presence, and flies off its roost, though in a very odd way, coming towards you rather than try to flee. The creature lands on your arm, just as the tablet infuses it with some mystical power, which the entity apparently contends is part of making it the first of the equalized, non-dormant members of its kind. And just as sudden as it had made itself known, the entity's presence vanishes. This has the effect of making you notice the increasingly heavier strain on your arm as the bat starts rapidly growing!

Unable to bear the weight of the growing creature, you drop your arm, causing the bat to fall off and tumble onto the dusty carpet by your bare feet. "Sorry!" you apologize, considering that maybe, just maybe, "equalizing" includes intelligence as well as size. Last thing you want is to anger your... guest in case this leads to it leading an animal revolution against humanity.

However, upon looking down at the nearly toddler sized bat, you notice...
1251.title: A bat... like the one hanging nearby!

12512.content:
As you watch on, the bat's body begins to shift and morph, changing rapidly into something not entirely bat-like. His bones audibly crack and pop as they shift into new positions; his forearms lengthen, wings pushing out as they bulk up, becoming larger; his neck pushed out and thickens, his head shifting about slightly; his torso rearranges itself into a more human-like shape, quickly becoming nigh-on indistinguishable from a humans - save for all of the fur - as his chest and abdomens form. His new waist subtly pinches in slightly as hips and pelvis form, the changes travelling down his body in a wave - his tiny legs widen and lengthen and thicken, muscles forming as a set of knees and feet come into existence with a loud pop.

There's a series of fleshy gurgles as his insides adjust, painlessly shifting about to allow them to function properly with his new shape - before he begins to grow again, slowly inching higher as he blinks, adjusting to his new body and intelligence. You gulp as your gazes meet, the bat having to look up a teeny little bit less with every passing moment. Clearing his throat - surprising you even further than what had just happened - he begins to speak, in a scratchy, somewhat high-pitched tone. "I-it's okay," He says, shifting awkwardly in place, surrounding his body with his wings - wings that, you notice, don't have a hand on the end, having maintained the same basic shape, albeit with a larger spiked 'thumb'.

Based on his appearance, you'd guess that he's a fruit bat of some kind - hope, even; you'd rather not have giant vampire bats flying around. He licks his lips and clears his throat again, before continuing. "I- I know you didn't mean to drop me. You don't have to apologise." You nod dumbly, still getting used to the idea of an animal... well, growing, transforming and then talking!

"Th-thanks," you stammer, kneeling down to put yourself on the same level as the man-bat. "I, uh- do you have a name? Mine's Blake."

The bat's eyes widen for a moment, as if in a panic. He looks up and down at his body, before speaking once again: "n-no..."
Hesitantly, you reach out with both arms, drawing him into a soft hug. Out of the corner of your eye, you can see the stone tablet glow again - and as it does, a feeling of... well, you're not exactly sure what it is you're feeling. You just want to comfort the bat... and mabe give him a name. Quietly shushing him, you hook an arm underneath his legs, lifting him up and holding him against your chest like you would an infant. The tablet blazes with light, but somehow you can't quite bring yourself to think about it.

As you begin to walk, you find yourself talking to him - "Maybe we can come up with a name together? After getting you some food, of course..."
The bat nods, conflicting emotions on his face - happiness, and bewilderment. There's another pulse of light from the tablet, and all you feel is... happiness.
12512.title: It's taking on a humanoid form, and is a male!

125121.content:
"Um... So," You mutter, the bat cradled in your arms. "What would you like to eat? I mean, I don't really know what bats eat, but I've got some stuff in the fridge. Or I could go out and grab something, if you need it."

The bat stares up at you for a moment, his arms and body shifting with each second "I can eat... anything," He murmurs, his speech still stuttering but his voice steadying. "Fruit or bugs are... favorite. But I can eat what you have."

"Well, that's good." You pull the attic door open and descend the flight of stairs, keeping the bat secure with every slow step you take. "Was that what you ate before, then?"

"Just ate bugs. Was... fun to catch them," He responds, his arms and wings batting against your arms, flapping steadily against you.

"I... I see," You mutter, your mind busy processing the rock in the attic and the bat in your arms. "I... Um... I don't know if you can go out to catch them right now, so we should just stick with what's I have for now, okay?"

The bat's head bucks up and down, nodding faster than you've ever seen before. You can't help but chuckle at his enthusiasm, and as you make your way downstairs, the bat's fuzz and fur pushing harder against your arms with every step.

When you arrive in the living room, you stop at the couch. You lower the bat down onto it, careful to avoid a repeat of the initial drop. "Sit tight, okay? I'll bring you a few things."

"Okay." The bat squirms in place, his hands shaking as they move away from you. "Hurry back?"

"It's just the kitchen. I'll only be a minute." You chuckle and move a hand to him, before you ruffle the fur atop his head. He almost squeaks in delight, a beaming grin shining back at you. You're filled with a sensation of comfort as you rub, and it takes an effort for you to pull yourself away.

The kitchen's a couple of rooms over. You don't have a lot of fruit available to you, but you grab some strawberries from the fridge. It takes you that one minute to give them a rinse and throw them into a bowl, and before you know it, you're heading back into the living room. But you stop at the door, your eyes pausing when you see the bat.

The bat's hands are shaking, but they're moving over his own body, grasping at his own chest and fur. His breathing starts and stops with every touch, hesitating before he moves onto another part of his body. Every time he grasps something, he flinches, before his eyes widen again. Your curiosity rises as you watch it go on for a minute, but his voice finally ends that.

"Um... Blake? Are you going to come back in here?" Though his eyes never turn to you, his raspy voice is as clear as day.

"Oh, sorry!" You stride towards him, and it takes a moment before you're at the couch. "I was just wondering what you were doing."

"I'm just... getting used to this. It still doesn't feel real," He mutters, one arm moving up so his hand can squeeze and feel the limb.

"I kinda know what you mean. It's all really unexpected. I mean, I still don't know what's supposed to happen. You're gonna be... What was it, 'equalized' or something like that? Made non-dormant? I don't know what that means, but... Well, you're here now, so I'll help however I can."

"Thanks, Blake." He smiles again, that warm feeling flowing through you as he does. You chuckle before you take a seat next to him, grabbing the bowl. "Oh, food?"

"Yeah, I had some around. Will these do?" You pick a strawberry out from the bowl and hang it in front of him. In a second, you're just hanging onto a stem, his mouth snapping it away and munching it, juice spilling over his fur. His eyes sparkle as they meet yours, and his head bobs faster and faster. "I'll take that as a yes," You laugh. He reaches for the bowl, his short limbs straining for it.

"More?"

"Hey, relax, it's not going anywhere. In fact... C'mere." You place the bowl on the couch, before both hands tug the bat closer. His head turns, but you slide his body up to you and lean his head against your legs. "Comfortable?"

"Y-yeah. Food?"

"Single-minded, aren't you?" You smile and take another strawberry. "You don't need to snap up, alright? I'll feed you."

One by one, you grasp the stem of every berry and push it to his mouth. He twitches, visibly restraining the urge to chomp it the moment it gets close. But each time the berry pushes into him, he bites off the entire thing and mashes it closed before swallowing, a little squeal escaping him each time. His meal takes minutes, and though his mouth is a mess, he's more than contented.

After the last bites are done...
125121.title: A First Meal

1253.content:
While you're still not sure what animal the image is showing yet, you are sure that whatever magic is behind this is putting a lot of very careful thought into this decision.

Or is actually magic at all? Is it alien technology? A force from a higher dimension?

You are drawn from your musings however, when you realise that the image appears to be clearing up.

The details are still unclear but provided that the image does not change drastically, you can tell that the animal is a quadruped and the animal is definitely very big...
1253.title: Big Bear or Big Bovine?

13.content:
At the end of the day, you go to bed as usual and fall asleep almost instantly.

You are in a huge white room that seems to go on for miles. There is a sturdy brown table near a wall, and you go over to it. You somehow know you're supposed to pick up and experiment with one of the items on the table, but which one will it be?
13.title: Dreams of Giants

choices: Walk away from the monitor and do something else
132.content:
You pick up a ray gun that you somehow know has the power to change the size of anything you see. Once you grab it, a monitor comes up from the ground near the center of the white room and you walk over to it. On its screen, two different destinations make up both halves of the electronic screen. The instructions on the right of the monitor read: "Choose one of these exotic destinations for your perfect vacation!"

On the left side of the screen was a lush jungle, and on the right was a beautiful beach. Where will you go?
132.title: Vacation

133.content:
You are most interested in the bag considering you don't know what it is and it gets the best out of your curiosity. However, as soon as you go over to the table and grab it to look inside you find yourself falling into it. You land with a soft thud onto the ground of another huge room, this one completely white as well and also going on for as far as the eye can see.

You suddenly notice that there is a label on your bag reading "ANIMAL PLUSHIES." You reach into the bag and pull out:
133.title: A mysterious bag

choices: another plushie appears in the bag
the lion plushie starts to grow
1331.content:
You aren't surprised that you pull out a lion plushie: after all, lions are your favorite animal. It looks a little odd though since it has the same proportions as and looks exactly like a real life adult lion. You're actually surprised it hasn't turned to life somehow and started roaring at you.

As soon as you start thinking this, something happens:
1331.title: a lion plushie

choices: The real lion begins to grow
Both the plushie and real lion grow together
13312.content:
The plushie begins to grow before your eyes, and you let it go on the white ground and step back in amazement. It takes up more and more space until it is the size of a real life, adult male lion. Its eyes then fix on you and it takes a step forward. You gasp and take another step backward; its body is no longer covered in a soft synthetic material, but real thick, golden lion fur. You realize you had a moving, breathing lion in front of you!

The lion looks at you curiously, then around the endless white room, and then at the floor in front of you. You look down and see another lion plushie in front of you. You pick it up and notice it looks like the exact same plushie that was in the bag just minutes ago.

You wonder if this one will grow too, and just as you think of the word:
13312.title: the lion plushie starts to grow

14.content:
Even though you are only 17 years old, you have always been a helpful person ever since you started helping your family around the farm at age 6. This is where your fascination with animals began; you almost began to feel one with the farmyard animals. There seemed to be a special, one of a kind bond between you and the animals you cared for.

However, as soon as you excitedly began working as a zookeeper for a large, popular zoo, you started to notice odd things happening. For example, whenever you would tend to the zebras and give them their daily fauna to feed on, you would notice their height change slightly as if they'd grown an inch or two in mere minutes. A few days later, you noticed changes with the panthers as well when you fed them their meat. They seemed a good half of a foot taller, but appeared to be acting normal. You feared being called crazy if you told your boss about these strange happenings, because apparently you were the only one noticing odd things occurring at the zoo.

A little cautious, you begin your work for the day as usual by collecting the animals' feed and all other materials that you would need. You were always pretty early for work everyday, so you really had no stress when it came to relying on a strict feeding schedule, which was nice since none of your fellow employees had as much freedom as you did.

You decide to go and take care of the animals in the...
14.title: Too Good

141.content: Is there only female lions or only male lions or both sexes?
141.title: Lion's den

145.content: You decide that you'd pay a visit to the...
145.title: Other Areas

choices: Fortunately for your sanity, the Wolf exhibit can be reached straight away.
The Grizzly and Polar Bears, you shudder to think of their sizes! (WPPU-Part 2)
The Primate exhibits,but will their minds have expanded along with their bodies?
1451.content:
The Wolves' Den feels like a good place to start today. You decide that it's a good idea to get started right away before anyone else shows up, so you immediately head for the food store. However, to do so you have to pass the Feline exhibits. That is when you notice that something is definitely not right.

You are already aware that, along with the Zebras, the Panthers seem to be bigger than they were when you first arrived. However, as you pass by the Lion's Den, the Cougar's Den and the Tiger Enclosure you suddenly realize that they are bigger too. They have all surged in size by a shocking two and a half feet! You immediately dart over to put the Panther Enclosure into your field of view and you can see that they have swelled up another two feet too!

That is not the only change that has overcome these felines, however. The body of every single Lion, Tiger, Cougar, and Panther has experienced another drastic change.

Muscle.

Huge, thick, powerful muscles bulge beneath their fur whenever they move, which allows you to see that their limbs appear to be as thick as tree trunks and their torsos are toned with what appears to be uncannily human musculature!

You lean back against the reinforced plexiglass wall of the Tiger enclosure and attempt to collect your thoughts so that you can try to figure out what is happening before you are interrupted by a loud and completely unexpected noise.

"Master?"

You immediately turn around to identify the source of the noise and when you do, you can only gasp and stare in mute shock.

One of the two Tigers stood behind you. She was very clearly female, judging from the particularly large breasts she is sporting, and she stood on her hind legs - on her hind legs in the same manner as that of a human! Bar the anatomical alterations that have resulted in a humanoid posture, she still had the phenotypic appearance of a tiger.

Jasmine.

You recall that her name is Jasmine, named after the colour of her eyes. And said eyes look down at you from high above the wall - you realize with a start that you only come up to her waist - and her face shifts into a huge grin of what seems like pure happiness. In the back of your mind, concerns over anthropomorphism make themselves known only to be beaten down with such ease it's almost as if the massive, muscular tiger before you had beaten them into submission with her own bare paws. These animals can walk on two legs and talk! They ARE anthropomorphic!

"Master? Are you okay?"

You are snapped out of your thoughts by her voice, her lovely voice as soft as velvet with a light purr underscoring her every word. She crosses her arms, her huge biceps flexing out to their impressive full size, and leans on the top of the wall which lets out a quiet creak of protest as the wall is subjected to the weight of a 12ft tiger's upper body.

As she rests her breasts on her folded arms, the wall gives out a sharp squeal which settles down to a dull creaking before she gets comfortable with her position and stops moving which enables you to see something that takes your breath away.

The wall's metal frame has buckled and bent into a perfect impression of her powerful arms. Such a casual and unintentional display of sheer, raw physical power sends a stab of instinctual, primal fear through your body until your attention is grabbed by Jasmine asking if you are okay again. By this point, the other tiger in the enclosure, a male tiger, and Jasmine's mate Bruce came up beside her. He is as muscular as Jasmine, with a solid set of 8-pack abdominals below two thick pectorals which are between two bulging shoulders. As you take in his immense musculature, you also notice that he is a bit taller than Jasmine, coming in at 13ft. Although you are immensely relieved that it also appears that he is as friendly as Jasmine as his first words are about yourself.

"Master? You're okay, right?" Bruce's deep, thundering voice asks to which you nod your head. You're not completely fine at all but you think that if you just get out of here and to the Wolves' Den you should just maybe avoid a mental breakdown. All the zoo's felines suddenly growing into huge, muscular, humanoid beings and calling you 'Master', was getting to be a bit too much to take in all at once for the moment, you really needed to get out of here and clear your head.

Fortunately, Bruce cheerfully bids you farewell with an assurance that the Wolves will be eager to see you. That makes you concerned as to how they know that but you have no time to dwell on that right now. You decide to make a quick exit for the food storage, observing Simba and Nala - the alpha lion pair - and Leo and Nova the other two lions who live in the zoo, also stand up on their hind legs ,the males reaching a solid 12ft and the females seemed to be about 11ft, Simba, and Nala putting their arms around each other and murmuring something to the Cougar, Wilson who at a quick glance, seemed to be around 13ft to match Bruce. However, in your dazed state, you didn't hear what was said but as you grabbed the food bags, you realized that you did notice two things. First, while you weren't sure of any definite way to determine by how much every animal would grow if this were to continue - which you had conflicting emotions about if you were perfectly honest with yourself. The second was that the animals seemed to have grown to heights which, comparatively, were relatively similar to their previous heights. It was certainly something that might help prepare you for the next exhibits you'd be passing through in a minute.
1451.title: Wolf Pack Power Up - Part 1: Nice Kitty

choices: When you arrive, you find the Alpha towering over his pack, waiting for you!
When you arrive, you find they're all the same size, waiting for you to show up!
14512.content:
The only way to get from to the Wolves' Den from the Feline exhibit is by passing through the Ursine Enclosures. Usually, that would fill you with delight; you loved seeing those beautiful animals. Now, however, was a different matter. Now, you were filled with a deep dread. Had the bears also grown, like the felines?

'Well, there's only one way to find out.' You think to yourself as you push the cart carrying the wolves' food stocks. You'll have to come back and feed the rest of the animals anyway, so you might as well see how many have grown.

The walk to the Ursine Enclosures is a thankfully uneventful one, leaving you to your racing thoughts. What if the bears have grown too? What if all the animals have grown? The thought leaves you dreading arriving at the bear exhibits, yet as you think back over what had happened to the felines, you feel an odd rush of heat throughout your body. A rush of... excitement?

However, your thoughts on that strange sensation are interrupted as you walk around the corner of the Ursine Exhibits, the tall trees no longer blocking your view, allowing you to see all the bears in their full glory.

You openly gape in awe as you gaze up at the towering titans. If the felines were big, then the bears were enormous!

Ben and Ella - the two black bears - loomed over you, Ella easily reaching 20 feet, and Ben clocking in at 21 feet at the bare minimum! The pair were built like professional bodybuilders; their limbs thicker than the trunks of the oak trees they towered over, their broad chests heaving with every deep breath they took. Yet despite their immense size, their expressions showed not even a single trace of hostility or aggression.

In fact, they seemed downright delighted to see you, as they both crouched down into a squatting position, Ben bracing his huge paws on his even bigger calf muscles, which easily outsized even the largest of their namesakes.

"Master!" He smiles, his thunderous bass shaking your comparatively tiny form.

You raise a hand in greeting, smiling nervously. It's rather difficult to not feel slightly intimidated when you're in the shadow of a bear the size of a large house.

Ella reaches out, her thick arms easily reaching over the fence and, with a gentleness that something that size simply should not be capable of, brushed a massive fingertip over your head, ruffling your hair.

She let out a giggle powerful enough to shake the concrete beneath you slightly, bringing her hand to her muzzle as her face lit up with delight.

You sort your hair as Ben animatedly waves towards the Grizzly Bear Enclosure opposite them. "Hey, Yuri! Anna! Look who's here!" He yells, his voice putting thunder to shame.

As the ground trembles beneath your feet, you turn to see the two Grizzly Bears padding towards the wall of their enclosure, the two of them even bigger than Ben and Ella, with Yuri reaching 25 feet and Anna reaching 24, at a rough estimate.

You grin slightly as you greet the two titans who both smile widely at you.

"Master! It's good to see you again! I take it you're on the way to feed the wolves?" Yuri booms from up high, even though he's crouched, he's still taller than a single-story house.

You nod, looking down at the cart you're pushing, taking note of the many food bags, the zoo not willing to pay for either the acquisition or storage of fresh carcasses.

"Well then, by all means, don't let us keep you!" Came another voice.

You looked to your left, down the road to the exhibit at the end - where the path split to the Wolves' Den and one of the bathrooms.

That exhibit was the Polar Bear exhibit.

A now 30-foot Polar Bear waved enthusiastically at you - Frost, the male bear - as another, 29-foot bear - Orso, the female - walked up behind him, beaming in delight at the sight of you.

"Hey there Master! It's great to see you! I guess you've met some of the others?" Orso called.

You nod dumbly at the sight of them, their powerful, hulking frames rising into the sky, leaving you half-astonished that they hadn't been spotted.

"Well, the Wolves can't wait to see their favorite zookeeper again, especially now that they've changed! Lupus has quite the surprise for you!" Frost beams, his eyes shining as if his namesake were in the path of the sun across the Arctic plains.

You bite your lip at the mention of the wolves. You're anxious, yet oddly eager to see them now that they've surely undergone the same changes as all the feline and ursine members of the zoo. The mention of the pack Alpha, Lupus, also piqued your interest; what surprise could he possibly have to show you? What surprise could possibly be worth mentioning more than turning into an enormous anthropomorphic, talking giant?

Taking a few deep breaths to steady your nerves, you bid your farewells to all the bears, who are all wide smiles and happy waves as they begin excitedly talking amongst each other, mostly about you, which you have to admit, is actually quite nice to hear.

You grab the cool, smooth metal of the cart's bar and begin to make your way to the Wolves' Den, having no idea what could be waiting for you.
14512.title: Wolf Pack Power Up - Part 2: Big Bears

1452.content:
You decided that you would go feed one of your favorite animals in the zoo; Beth the hippopotamus. Beth was huge even by hippopotamus standards and had bright tan-yellow skin. The massive beast was the zoo's only hippopotamus, brought in all the way from Egypt and living in an exhibit right next to where the zoo kept the rhinoceros. The zoo thought it would be best to keep the heaviest animals in the same area.

You were warned on your first day to be cautious around Beth. While she was an herbivore, she came from a very territorial species and was fully capable of biting you in half. However, hippos were one of your favorite animals and Beth was completely docile as long as she was fed. You walk up to the exhibit where Beth was kept and saw the hippo's nostrils sticking out of the water while the rest of her body was submerged.

"Beth!" you call out as you hold up a pumpkin and a cabbage. "Feeding time." The hippo gives a grunt and rises out of the water before walking up to the side of the hippo exhibit. But to your surprise, Beth looks bigger than usual and she was usually pretty big. "Oh no," you think. "Not you too, Beth." Beth is in fact so big that she could easily step out of her exhibit. And that was just what she did. Or at least half-way. The hippo's upper half was sticking out of the exhibit as her face loomed huge in front of you. Your jaw dropped because Beth looked like she was as big as an elephant.

Then the hippopotamus grunted to remind you she was hungry and opened her mouth whole. It looked big enough to fit a family of four in it. You smiled nervously and then you placed 3 pumpkins and 5 cabbages into the hippopotamus's mouth, signaling her to shut her jaws and grunt. The hippo chews her meal and swallows before smiling. Then she did something that really surprised you.

"Thank you." Said the hippopotamus in a surprisingly high-pitched voice for such an enormous creature. You gasp. "Beth?" you ask. "Did you just...?" Without warning, Beth stood on her hind legs, looming three times bigger than you and then she suddenly grew long black hair and her body became more humanoid in shape, complete with.... more feminine features. She then blew a kiss at you and as you were wrapping your head around what happened, the hippopotamus grew bigger and bigger and in seconds she was...
1452.title: Hungry Hippo

15.content:
Legendary Animals: You are a biologist explorer that has been searching his entire life for the 11 legendary animals. The 11 legendary animals are the hawk, anaconda, bear, shark, tiger, wolf, stag, gorilla, orca, lion and horse. These animals became legendary when they were enchanted when they saved at least 5 humans from death. But little do you know, these animals have a tendency to grow...

Over-Protective Animals: All animals are starting to become protective of humanity. However, they are maybe becoming a bit too protective, as they are starting to grow larger in order to protect your species from everything that might be a danger, even if it isn't.

Role Reversal: Everyone in the world notices their pets growing larger and larger. Pretty soon, these animal friends are going end up taking care of their previous owners.

Enchanted Land: Somewhere in the world exist a magical place where very huge animals, perhaps even those only thought to exist in fantasy, live in peace and harmony. When a human gets shipwrecked off the coast of this place, he or she may find this mystical land to be even better than the vacation cruise that he paid for.
15.title: More Choices!

choices: A forest / a jungle / a savanna
151.content:
As you sail to your destination, you think of the wonders that might be in store for you if you do discover a legendary animal. Not only would you get awarded with the highest prestiges available for biologists worldwide, but it would also be a huge scientific breakthrough; scientists could study and fully understand what makes these animals have such a remarkable nature as to why they would save a person's life, let alone 5. The mere thought of how much knowledge that could be gained from just this one research expedition made you incredibly excited.

When the boat finally docks, you are in awe of the island that you have come to explore. It was even more stunning than it was it pictures: a lush green landscape awaited you, filled with an almost endless amount of forest trees, soft, rolling hills, and white, sandy beaches. A large, pine tree-covered mountain rested in the center of the island and reflected the midday sun beautifully.

There were so many spots on the island to explore you didn't know where to start first. However, you eventually came to a decision and decided to go to...
151.title: Legendary Animals

1511.content:
According to your notes, the hawk, bear, stag and wolf were last seen in a forest.

The tiger and gorilla were last seen in a jungle.

The lion was seen in a small savanna past the jungle.

Which of these island spots will you go to?
1511.title: The expansive areas

1512.content:
According to your notes, the horse was last seen in a valley close to the mountain.

The anaconda was last seen in marsh on the opposite side of the island.

Which of these island spots will you go to?
1512.title: The lowlands

choices: An entire herd of horses running towards you
A single horse running toward you
15121.content:
You decided to head to the valley as the legendary horse interested you the most. As you travel to the valley via driving in your Jeep, you think about how much has been said about the horses on this island being extraordinary. There is a small herd of about 20 or so living in the valley close to the large mountain, and you have heard that they have adapted to their island environment wonderfully.

However, there is something odd: they seem to be quite larger than regular horses although they have such a limited diet of valley grasses; you would think they would constantly subjected to malnutrition. You conclude that there must be something else that is increasing their size ever so little, year after year, and you intend to solve this mystery with good old fashioned field research. Maybe it has something to do with the legendary horse that saved 5 people from death?

You finally reach your destination and park your Jeep. Upon climbing out, you look up in awe of the beauty around you; there's so much lush landscape and beautiful views of the mountain and even the ocean. The expanse of the valley is impressive as well; soft rolling hills filled with light green grass dominate the landscape.

As you're taking in this beautiful landscape, you suddenly hear the sound of trampling hooves in the distance. You quickly glance over to your left and squint as you see...
15121.title: A valley

choices: Go stand in the middle of the herd
151211.content:
Even though the herd was hundreds of feet away, they galloped towards you with incredible speed. They stopped about a few feet in front of you in mere seconds. You then had a chance to take in their beauty.

They stood high, about 7 feet high each to be exact. However, the huge stallion in the front of the group appeared about a foot or two taller than the others and had a majestic black seen to his brilliant coat. The other 19 horses whinnied as they pawed the soft grass slowly, but they appeared perfectly relaxed and patient. All these horses must have been male due to their bodily proportions and distinct whinnies; you found this to be very odd, groups of male horses like this didn't exist anywhere else in the world, nor were they all so huge. The other brown stallions were apparently waiting for the black stallion to act; he must have been the leader.

The black stallion trotted up to you and you were amazed at its sheer size. It truly was a beautiful specimen, and it stood nearly 9 feet tall. It looked down at you with a keen interest and you can automatically tell that the horses don't view you as a threat. Instead, it appears that the stallion wants you to do something. You can tell that it wants you to...
151211.title: An entire herd of horses running towards you

1512112.content:
From the motions of the black stallion's head, you suspect that it wants you to head towards the middle of the herd. You do so, and once you are in the middle the other horses trot back slowly, forming a wide circle around you and their leader. The both of you stare at each other. This is the most interesting behavior you have ever seen from horses; they seem a lot more intelligent and adapted when it comes to humans.

"The herd of beautiful horses you have here is truly remarkable," you say to the large stallion, looking around at all the other interested horses. "I must say it's an honor to finally meet the legendary horses on this island!"

All the horses seemed to smile as you looked at them and the stallion gave a small snort.

"What strikes me most about your unique species (you are a new species, aren't you?) is how you get so big. You," you point to the huge stallion in front of you, "must be at least 9 feet tall!" you exclaim. He seems to nod and then paws the ground eagerly.

You look around as one of the brown horses in the circle kneels down and motions eating grass with its mouth and then gets back up and shakes its head, snorting.

"So, you don't get so big from the food you eat?"

The horse nods.

"Then what do you get so big from?"

Upon this question, the other horses seem to instinctively trot at least ten feet backwards in all directions. Before you can even start to think how odd this is something amazing started to happen.

The handsome black stallion in front of you, already a good 9 feet tall, started to tense a little bit as a noticeable white glow surrounded its body. Before your very eyes, the horse started to grow and grow for a good minute or so before it was at least 20 feet tall. You barely came up to its knees!

"Wow, that is amazing!" you say in awe. Normally you would be scared of something like this but you can easily tell that these horses were used to humans and had no bad intentions.

It had also dawned on you that you had just witnessed the power of the enchantments of the legendary stallion! You just couldn't believe it; this was every biologist's dream!

"This is simply extraordinary..." you breathe, staring up at the giant horse. The horse whinnies excitedly at your reaction and paws the ground a little; you can tell it enjoys being this size.

The other horses seem a little excited too; they must be anxious for something to happen. Apparently the stallion's powers excite the horses to this day, which is very odd considering the stallion is rumored to live forever.

It suddenly hit you why the horses were acting in such a way. After saving 5 people from death, the stallion was granted its powers from the spirit of Nature on one condition: it could only exercise its powers with the consent of a human being. You realize that you are the human that the horses, and the stallion in particular, have sought for hundreds of years.

"Wait, let me get this straight..." you say in an attempt to take in all the mind boggling information. It hurt a little bit to crane your neck up so high to look the handsome equine in the face. "You, the legendary stallion, have been waiting for me to use your powers?"

Again, the stallion whinnied eagerly as well as the other horses surrounding the both of you. They all seemed to radiate warm happiness; you couldn't blame them seeing that they had just found the one person that will most likely make their dreams come true.

You also realize the circumstances of the horses' mysterious size; the stallion must have received a certain amount of power upon its bestowing of its power and decided to share some of his power with the rest of the herd. It was all making sense now.

"So, I assume these powers allow you to change your size? And you can share it with the herd if you wish?"

The stallion nodded twice, snorting and shaking its head slightly and happily. You grinned up at his huge frame, and looked around at the other excited horses.

"What do you all say? Should I keep on letting him enjoy his powers?" you ask.

All the 19 brown horses stomp the grass-covered ground repeatedly in the utmost excitement and happiness. You know that if you grow the leader even more that he will most likely share some of his size with his fellow horses.

"All right then, here goes!" Your starting to get a little excited yourself; who knows what this stallion is capable of?

You concentrate hard on the stallion and wish that he would grow. Sure enough, the white glow returns, embodying the horse once more. He remains relatively quiet as he soon continues his growth. However, there is still plenty of noise from the excited horses around us and the ground shaking due to the massive equine in front of you.

As soon as the white glow fades you attempt to look up at the stallion's face and can barely do so as you crane your neck to the limit; he must have been 100 feet tall!
1512112.title: Go stand in the middle of the herd

choices: grow all the horses to his size
15121122.content:
As the horse contemplates this, he instead comes up with his own ideas, internally thinking

"this human did come all the way out here, i'd might as well give him an experience he'd never forget" he nickered at the tiny human and leant his head down to him, snorting a little bit he bowled the human onto his rump, with the power of his breath alone.
15121122.title: Grow another horse

15122.content:
You decide to go check out the marshland first to see if you can find the surprisingly elusive anaconda. Its said to be the largest snake in the entire world, but you find it odd that no one has seen it except for those people that it saved from death, and even those people said they only saw it shortly after it saved them until it mysteriously vanished. The mystery surrounding the giant snake and the descriptions from the eyewitness accounts have you intrigued, and you soon set off for the opposite side of the island.

After about a 2 hour hike through the jungle and around the mountain, you find that the trees are starting to thin. After another 10 minutes, you find yourself in a vast, low lying marshland that is filled with tall, thick blades of grass and mud that continues to become thicker and wetter as you trudge on.

In all your years of studying the world's habitats you have never seen a marshland so chock full of vegetation. However, the weirdest thing about this area was that you have not seen as much as a single insect after searching for a good half hour. The deep silence is a little unnerving; the only sound you hear is that of your boots squelching up and down through the vegetation and mud.

Suddenly, you hear a loud sound as though something was sliding through the marsh behind you. You whip around quickly, looking through the grass, and spot what looked like a large log but you couldn't tell since it was gone it a split second.

You tentatively walk forward, still looking behind you, and your foot makes contact with something heavy. You look forward timidly and gasp in awe.

There, lying right in front of you, is a section of the biggest snake body you have ever seen. Its so massive that you automatically step back so you can see its entire body more clearly.

Its body's incredible length seems to go on for miles as it twists and turns through the dense marshland. Looking at the coil in front of you, the mere thickness of it is simply astounding; it must be at least 3 feet thick and 4 feet high! The brown and black pattern on its scales was pretty too
15122.title: A huge snake

choices: suit up in your scuba gear and prepare to dive
1513.content:
According to your notes, the orca and shark were last seen in the ocean surrounding the island.

You decide to...
1513.title: The beach

155.content:
Mother Nature's Revenge: Mother Nature is angry at the way animals across the world are being treated by humans and wants to do something about it. She settles on giving one animal the power of size, allowing it to change the size of itself, other animals, or humans.

The New Animal God: The supreme God and creator of the universe, Sarbon, has grown weary over time. This God has decided to step aside in favor of letting a new animal god take charge. This new god is not going to just have things handed over to him though. He is going to have to start off small and move up from there. Whether he chooses to be good, evil, or something in between is all up to him.

*This god can have other powers as well instead of just size; their size is only an indication of how powerful they really are.
*A god can gain power through different methods. A few examples would be by gaining worshipers, conquering new lands, inspiring fear in the masses, gaining objects of power (like an enchanting ring or sword), and whatever else seems like it would help a god become more powerful.
155.title: More Choices!

1551.content:
Mother Nature looks into a magic mirror and sees a fox being killed by a man who wants to make clothes out of the fox's fur.
Then she said, "I hate when someone does that to an animal! I think I will give an animal the power of size for them to fight back! But what animal should I give the power to...?"
1551.title: Mother Nature's Revenge

15511.content: "Okay, I think I will give the power to a canine. But what canine should I choose?"
15511.title: A canine

155112221.content:
Still sore at seeing a fox killed solely for it's fur, Mother Nature decided to observe an isolated forest that they were native to. She figured that they would be less likely to be hunted there and watching them would calm her down but she was greeted with a similar gruesome sight. A duo of humans were stomping through the forest as they chased a fleeing fox, firing their rifles wildly in it's direction while hooting and hollering. Mother Nature was livid, to say the least. The fox, a female with the most beautiful orange and white fur was running for her life as bullets narrowly miss her. Despite her speed, the humans always seemed to catch up somehow.

Then, Mother Nature made a decision. She would give this fox a blessing so she could enact revenge against the humans. A blessing that would allow her to grow as big as she wanted. A blessing that would give her power over the size of every living animal of Earth, including humans. It might have been irresponsible to give a wild animal such a power, but Mother Nature decided that it was about time humans got their comeuppance.

With the fox imbued with her new size-altering power Mother Nature implanted a thought into her mind that would help trigger one of it's effects. "If only I was much bigger than them!" She channeled to the fox, still fleeing from the pursuing humans. Just as she planned, a string of thoughts began to stir in the vixen's mind.

"If I grew bigger than them or if they were the size of mice, I could easily take them down!" The fox thought to herself, frustrated at her situation. Surprisingly clear images of her towering over the trees or the humans being shrunk smaller than her paw began popping into her mind as she continued running from them.

It was then that...
155112221.title: A fox

choices: The fox plans on taking on the humans alone and approaches a small town.
The fox tries growing other animals to help her get revenge.
1551122211.content:
The vixen kept running for her life as the humans continued pursuing her. She cursed her small size, wishing desperately that she could be big enough to defend herself. As she ran she felt a strange tight sensation throughout her body as if her skin was struggling to contain her. As a gunshot whizzed past her head she ignored the feeling and kept running. Unknown to the vixen and her pursuers, she was slowly growing bigger and soon reached the size of a large wolf.

As her size increased so did the distance each step took her she soon found herself outrunning the humans as their yells grew more distant. To be safe, though, she kept running as fast as she could to the safety of her den. It was then the fox noticed that many of the shrubs she passed by were actually shorter than her. This caused her to slow to a trot as she tried to figure out where she was. She could have sworn this was the path she took earlier when she left her den but everything seemed different. Smaller.

Eventually she reached a dense wall of shrubbery. Her den was like a fortress surrounded by walls of these tightly-packed shrubs, the only entrance being a small thoroughfare just big enough to fit her. It used to fit her at least. As she looked at the small opening it finally dawned on the vixen that she was much bigger than she was a moment ago. Crouching down she could barely fit her snout through the opening, she figured she must have been taller and bigger than a bear!

Her tail flicked side-to-side in excitement. "My wish came true!" She thought to herself as she stomped around reveling the new power her legs contained. Her celebration was short-lived however as the yelling of the humans reached her ears once again. Standing as tall as a bear she was quite large but the guns the humans carried frightened her. She wished she could be even bigger so she could stand up to them. Suddenly her body shivered and the tight sensation she felt earlier returned as her form began to grow once more. Inch after inch she grew until another foot was added on to her height.

A connection was quickly created in her mind. To test her theory she imagined herself growing even bigger and much to her surprise she shot up another foot. A flood of excitement overwhelmed her as she realized she had full control over her size. The hollering of the humans was getting louder but instead of fear the vixen felt anticipation. She watched as they weaved past a group of trees and shrubs into view. "There it is!" One of them smugly announced.

The second pulled up his gun. "It's standing still, shoot..." The hunter trailed off as he looked through the sights. That was the moment the vixen was waiting for. The dread as they realized the small little animal they were chasing is now much, much bigger. Since they were frozen in fear and confusion by the sight before them the fox decided to make herself even bigger for them. Her vision rose as everything around her seemed to get smaller. Despite being a fair distance away, the hunters quickly realized that the beast had grown bigger causing them to quickly turn tail to run away from the giant fox.

That was exactly what the fox wanted. Speeding up into a slow trot she actually found she was still keeping up with the humans on account of her size. As she got closer and closer it looked like she was twice as tall as the humans. Joyfully watching her previous hunters running away from her, she began formulating her revenge plan. Continuing her chase, she began making herself bigger yet again, slowly expanding as she followed the humans. She savored the look of fear on their faces as they turned around to see that their pursuer was even bigger than the last time they saw her.

She suddenly stopped her growth as she felt the branches of the trees above brush against her back. The fox was about 20 feet from feet to shoulder and her bulky size was making it difficult to traverse the forest, her thighs and shoulders occasionally dislodging a tree whenever she bumps into one. Eventually the moment she was waiting for happened. One of the hunters risked looking back and caught his foot on an exposed root, causing him to smack face first to the ground.

Rolling over the human pulled the gun towards the vixen's chest and shot. The fox felt barely a pinprick as she went to stand over him, stamping her feet down to either side of his body causing him to release his gun from fright. With the human submitting the fox takes some time to toy with her prey by snicking her nose into his chest to smell his scent. The human whimpered as the fox opened her maw and a fleshy tongue dragged across the entirety of his body. After a barrage of licks she sneaks her tongue under his legs and starts to pull the man into her mouth sending him into a panic. Pulling his waist into her mouth the man screams as the fox lifts him up into the air.

Fruitlessly punching the vixen's nose the hunter could only watch as the fox brought more of his body into her mouth. Almost at a painfully slow pace she brought inch after inch of the human inside her mouth. Before long the man was completely engulfed by her maw, his protests muffled as she closes her mouth. At 20 feet, the small man could just barely rest on the giant fox's tongue. Mercilessly the fox jostled the man about in her mouth as she tasted him all over, his sweat giving him a slightly salty taste. A growling sound coming up from the back of her throat signaled the end of her teasing though as she tilted her head up and swallowed.
